Title: AI Journal Daily - Reflection - App Store - Apple
Author: 
Published Date: 2023-07-09T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/ai-journal-daily-reflection/id1504547616
Text: Guided Mental Health Diary Free · In-App Purchases Don't just write, reflect! Our AI coach asks personalized questions, guiding you deeper into your thoughts and turning your journal into a powerful personal growth tool.
The AI-powered journal that helps you go deeper. Reflection.app gives you gentle writing guidance, insightful daily prompts, and AI-enhanced search—so you can write privately, gain mental clarity, foster gratitude, and nurture a positive mindset. It's the one place to find daily headspace and track growth in a beautiful, minimalist journaling app on mobile and desktop.
BENEFITS OF JOURNALING
Journaling improves your life—from mental health to emotional intelligence and self-awareness. Daily writing transforms thoughts, emotions, and experiences into words. Through consistent journaling, find meaning, perspective, reduce anxiety, and shine.
// "The best app for journaling…and I've tried many. Reflection is a simple tool with all features I need, without clutter. Looking for essentials in beautiful design? Look no further. I use

* [Información](#)
* [Transcripción](#)
* # Enhanced suggestions for your journaling app
Find out how your journaling app can display journaling suggestions with richer content from the system. Explore new types of available content like state of mind data, reflection prompts, and support for third-party media content and motion-based activities.

* 2:34 -[Suggestion updates](https://developer.apple.com/la/videos/play/wwdc20
